channel.title: [Turbo] - Neutral Showdown II - Signups
channel.description:
**Welcome to [Turbo] - Neutral Showdown II**
Hosted by @KyoDaz
This setup follows simple forum rules. The setup will start on day one. There is no day one lynch.
**Gameplay**
Days will be 15 minutes long. Day one will be 7 minutes long. Nights will be 7 minutes long. All actions must be done in your rolecard. The neutral alignment is the [color=#FF7A21]Orange Lily[/color]. There will be no duplicate classes.
[details="Turbo Time"] [color=#FF0000]T[/color][color=#CC0033]u[/color][color=#990066]r[/color][color=#660099]b[/color][color=#3300CC]o[/color] [color=#0033CC]T[/color][color=#006699]i[/color][color=#009966]m[/color][color=#00CC33]e[/color] is enabled.
This means that if only one vote is needed to be received, the day automatically has a three minute timer to end it. This timer becomes irrelevant if someone unvotes and will be reset upon being voted or if the day already has less than three minutes to end.
This is primarily meant to speed up the game whilst also allowing the person a time to testify and people to change reads. [/details]
**Executions**
To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Executions will be plurality. Players are not lynched until the end of the day unless all votes are received. Ties in the votes are considered no-lynch.
Please ask if you are unsure of any lynch scenarios.
**To Join**
To join, please '**/in**'.
**Rolelist** Can be extended to 8p or 12p.
Random [color=#FF7A21]Orange Lily[/color] Random [color=#FF7A21]Orange Lily[/color] Random [color=#FF7A21]Orange Lily[/color] Random [color=#FF7A21]Orange Lily[/color] Random [color=#FF7A21]Orange Lily[/color] Random [color=#FF7A21]Orange Lily[/color]
**Role Cards**
[quote="Jane, post:15, topic:81621, full:true"] [details=Classes for nerds] [quote="KyoDaz, post:4, topic:78741, full:true"] O3
> # [color=#FF7A21]Clown[/color] > Every night you may visit someone. This does nothing except make you appear to visit someone. > You start with a [color=brown]tunic[/color]. > > Ensure that you are executed. Doing so will end the game. [/quote]
[quote="KyoDaz, post:5, topic:78741, full:true"] O4
> # [color=#FF7A21]Butcher[/color] > Every night you must kill a player provided you are able to. > > Ensure you are one of the last two players standing. [/quote]
[quote="KyoDaz, post:10, topic:78741, full:true"] O9 > # [color=#FF7A21]Saint[/color] > You are assigned a player to protect on Night 0. > During the night you may decide to die in their place if they are to die tonight or anytime tomorrow. You can only use this ability once. > > Ensure that your target lives until the end of the game. [/quote]
[quote="JakeTheWolfie, post:13, topic:78741, full:true"] O12 > # [color=#FF7A21]Botanist[/color] > Every night, Kill a player. > > Kill 3 Yellow Poppies and 1 White Primrose. [/quote]
[quote="KyoDaz, post:14, topic:78741, full:true"] O13
> # [color=#FF7A21]Prankster[/color] > During Night 0 you are given a target to lynch. This cannot be a member of the [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color]. > > Ensure that your target is executed. Doing so will end the game. [/quote]
[quote="Marshal, post:15, topic:78741, full:true"] O14
> # [color=#FF7A21]Thief[/color] > Every night target a player. Steal any items that they hold or would hold tonight. You will be informed what items you have stolen. > > Steal at least 2 items over the course of the game. [/quote]
[quote="JakeTheWolfie, post:24, topic:78741, full:true"] O23 > # [color=#FF7A21]Time Reaper[/color] > Every night, either steal an hour from someone, if you steal 2 hours from someone they die, or lose 3 hours to kill anyone who you've stolen an hour from. > > If you die but have at least one hour, you will prevent yourself from taking action, lose an hour, and be brought back to life. You start with one hour. > > Kill off all members of the [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color] and [color=#FFD505]Yellow Poppy[/color]. [/quote]
[quote="KyoDaz, post:25, topic:78741, full:true"] O24 > # [color=#FF7A21]Candlemaker[/color] > Every night you may kill someone. > The candle's size starts at 6. If a candle reaches past size 12, the candlemaker will start a new candle on size one. If a candle reaches below size 0, the new candle will start on size 12. > You are informed of the candle's size on each daystart. > > If the victim is [color=#FFD505]Yellow Poppy[/color], the candle rises by 1. > If the victim is [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color], the candle rises by 2. > If the victim is [color=#FF7A21]Orange Lily[/color], the candle melts by 3. > The candlemaker gets an extra life if a candle reaches size 9. > The candlemaker dies if a candle reaches 3. > > Bring your candle's size to exactly 12 or be one of the last two players standing. [/quote]
[quote="KyoDaz, post:27, topic:78741, full:true"] O26
> # [color=#FF7A21]Werewolf[/color] > During Night 0 you are informed of all roles in the setup. > You may decide to eat someone during the night and guess their role. > > If correct... strongman the player and kill them. You gain immunity to the lynch tomorrow. > If wrong... you are mod revealed as the Werewolf. > > > Ensure you are one of the last two players standing. [/quote]
[quote="Magnus, post:29, topic:78741, full:true"] O28 ># [color=Orange]Deviant[/color] > Every two days, you can create an anonymous event via the host. This will take place instead of the trial. The winner will get an item of choice. > *Win an event.* [/quote]
[quote="JakeTheWolfie, post:31, topic:78741, full:true"] O30 > # [color=#FF7A21]Ventriloquist[/color] > Each night, if you do not have a puppet, choose someone to become your puppet. They will be notified of this. > If you do have a puppet, force them to kill someone. They will be redirected to that person. > > Kill off all members of the [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color] and [color=#FFD505]Yellow Poppy[/color]. [/quote]
[quote="Isaac_Gonzalez, post:35, topic:78741, full:true"] O33 > # [color=#FF7A21]Corrupted Gun Dealer[/color] > You start with 1 broken flintlock that has a 25% of killing the target but a 75% chance of backfiring > You may give this flintlock to someone else or use it if needed > >Ensure you are one of the last two players standing [/quote]
[quote="Isaac_Gonzalez, post:64, topic:78741, full:true"] O37 > # [color=#FF7A21]Knight[/color] > You start with 1 kinfe and 1 tunic > > Ensure you are one of the last two players standing [/quote]
[quote="Isaac_Gonzalez, post:72, topic:78741, full:true"] > # [color=#FF7A21]Armorer[/color] > You have 2 broken tunics that both have only a 50% chance of protecting the player > You may give a player a broken tunic or keep it for yourself > if Armorer gives a player a tunic the player will not be informed until they get shot and protected by it > > > Survive to the end [/quote]
[quote="Isaac_Gonzalez, post:73, topic:78741, full:true"] > # [color=#FF7A21]Miner[/color] > Every night you may use your [color=#FFa2]Pickaxe[/color] to get [color=#FF0]Gold[/color] > As a last ditch effort you may use your pickaxe to kill someone but the pickaxe will break and can't get gold anymore > ##### Tunic - 2 gold > ##### Kinfe - 4 gold > ##### Flintlock - 5 gold. Upgrade for 2 gold > ##### Suit - 3 gold > ##### Stungun - 2 gold >Upgraded flintlock would kill even if the target has a tunic on >You can get 1-3 gold per night > > Be the last one standing [/quote]
[quote="Magnus, post:84, topic:78741, full:true"] 048 > # [color=#FF7A21]Wrestler[/color] > Every night you may wrestle someone to the death. You will have a 10% chance to lose. They will have a 90% chance to lose. You cannot use items. > > Ensure that at least 2 players are wrestled to death. [/quote]
[quote="KyoDaz, post:85, topic:78741, full:true"] O49 > # [color=#FF7A21]Witch[/color] > Every night you may select two players to listen on to. > If any of the chosen players visits you then you will kill the player(s) visiting. > > Kill two players successfully. Doing so will end the game immediately. [/quote]
[quote="KyoDaz, post:87, topic:78741, full:true"] O51 > # [color=#FF7A21]Demolitionist[/color] > Every night you may plant a bomb on someone. > > Kill three players through a bomb. Doing so will end the game as you the victor. [/quote]
[quote="Magnus, post:88, topic:78741, full:true"] 052 > # [color=#FF7A21]Android[/color] > Every night you may analyse someone. You will calculate the chances for them to be a killer class out of 10. > Having a gun or knife, protective clothing, being a killing class and having previously killed someone will all raise it by 1. > > Ensure that you are one of the last 2 standing. [/quote]
[quote="Magnus, post:90, topic:78741, full:true"] 053 > # [color=#FF7A21]Hot Potato[/color] > You will be given a bomb at the start of the game. All players will be alerted there is a bomb in play. > A bomb will be given to a random player on D3. This will take place instead of a trial. > > Ensure that you are executed. Doing so will end the game. [/quote] [/details] [/quote] https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sandbox-turbo-thread-mass-class-thread/78741/
Players:
1. Wazza 2. Jane 3. Italy 4. Hippo 5. Clonedcheese
